targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Queries per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Query average response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: RT

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, *
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s ORDER BY max_time / calls DESC LIMIT 50;

WITH
      metrics AS (
        SELECT
          application_name,
          pid,
          query,
          SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - state_change))::bigint)::float AS process_idle_seconds_sum,
          COUNT(*) AS process_idle_seconds_count
        FROM pg_stat_activity
        WHERE state = 'active'
        AND backend_type = 'client backend'
        GROUP BY application_name, pid, query
      ),
      buckets AS (
        SELECT
          application_name,
          le,
          SUM(
            CASE WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - state_change)) <= le
              THEN 1
              ELSE 0
            END
          )::bigint AS bucket
        FROM
          pg_stat_activity,
          UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 5, 15, 30, 60, 90, 120, 300]) AS le
        GROUP BY application_name, pid, query, le
        ORDER BY application_name, le
      )
    SELECT
      application_name,
      pid,
      query,
      process_idle_seconds_sum / 60 as minute_sum
    FROM metrics JOIN buckets USING (application_name)
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4;

list.definition:
SELECT queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements pgs, pg_database pgb
WHERE pgb.oid = pgs.dbid AND pgb.datname = '$datname' ORDER BY total_time / calls DESC LIMIT 1000;
list.description: Top 1000 Query ID in QPS Descending order
list.label: Query
list.name: query
list.query:
SELECT queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements pgs, pg_database pgb
WHERE pgb.oid = pgs.dbid AND pgb.datname = '$datname' ORDER BY total_time / calls DESC LIMIT 1000;

current.text: SELECT checkpoints_timed, checkpoints_req, checkpoint_write_time, checkpoint_sync_time, buffers_checkpoint, buffers_clean, buffers_backend, maxwritten_clean, buffers_backend_fsync, buffers_alloc, extract($1 FROM stats_reset) AS reset_time FROM pg_stat_bgwriter
current.value: SELECT checkpoints_timed, checkpoints_req, checkpoint_write_time, checkpoint_sync_time, buffers_checkpoint, buffers_clean, buffers_backend, maxwritten_clean, buffers_backend_fsync, buffers_alloc, extract($1 FROM stats_reset) AS reset_time FROM pg_stat_bgwriter
